CPU 频率设置
Impostazioni della frequenza della CPU
CPU-snelheidsinstellingen
CPU frequency settings
CPU frequency settings
Ρυθμίσεις συχνότητας επεξεργαστή
component.summary: Adjust the frequency of the CPU
Adjust the frequency of the CPU
Adjust the frequency of the CPU

description.p: A graphical utility for changing the CPU frequencies and governor.
用于更改 CPU 频率和调速器的图形实用程序。
Un'utilità grafica per modificare le frequenze della CPU e la sua gestione.
Een grafische toepassing voor het aanpassen van de CPU-snelheden en -governors.
A graphical utility for changing the CPU frequencies and governor.
A graphical utility for changing the CPU frequencies and governor.
Γραφικό εργαλείο για την αλλαγή των συχνοτήτων του επεξεργαστή.

This utility can change the operating frequency of the CPU for each core separately. The program can detect offline cores and only present the available ones. Furthermore, if a core doesn't support frequency scaling is not shown. There is also an option to apply the same settings to all cores simultaneously.
该实用程序可以分别更改每个内核的 CPU 的工作频率。 该程序可以检测到离线核心，并且仅显示可用的核心。 此外，如果内核不支持频率调节，则不会显示。 还有一个选项可以将相同的设置同时应用于所有内核。

Questa utility può modificare la frequenza operativa della CPU per ogni coreseparatamente. Il programma può rilevare core offline e presentare soloquelli disponibili. Inoltre, se un core non supporta il ridimensionamento della frequenza nonè mostrato. C'è anche un'opzione per applicare le stesse impostazioni a tutti i corecontemporaneamente.

Met deze toepassing kun je de handelingssnelheid aanpassen van de CPU, evt. zelfs per kern. De toepassing detecteert automatisch inactieve kernen en toont alleen de actieve. Als een kern geen ondersteuning heeft voor snelheidsaanpassingen, wordt deze niet getoond. Er is tevens een optie om de instellingen toe te passen op alle kernen.

This utility can change the operating frequency of the CPU for each core separately. The program can detect offline cores and only present the available ones. Furthermore, if a core doesn't support frequency scaling is not shown. There is also an option to apply the same settings to all cores simultaneously.

This utility can change the operating frequency of the CPU for each core separately. The program can detect offline cores and only present the available ones. Furthermore, if a core doesn't support frequency scaling is not shown. There is also an option to apply the same settings to all cores simultaneously.

Αυτή η εφαρμογή μπορεί να αλλάξει τις συχνότητες λειτουργίας των πυρήνων του επεξεργαστή. Το πρόγραμμα αναγνωρίζει ποιοι πυρήνες είναι εκτός λειτουργίας και εμφανίζει μόνος τους διαθέσιμους. Επίσης, εάν ένας πυρήνας δεν υποστηρίζει την αλλαγή των ορίων δεν εμφανίζεται στη λίστα. Τέλος, υπάρχει επιλογή να εφαρμοσθούν οι αλλαγές σε όλους τους διαθέσιμους πυρήνες συγχρόνως.
To apply the settings, the user must be local and active, as well as in group sudo. Local and active users not in this group must authenticate themselves as admin in order to apply the settings.
要应用设置，用户必须是本地活动用户，而且必须在 sudo 组中。 不在此组中的本地活动用户必须以 admin 身份进行身份验证才能应用设置。

Per applicare le impostazioni, l'utente deve essere locale e attivo, nonché nelgruppo sudo. Gli utenti locali e attivi non in questo gruppo devono autenticarese stessi come amministratore per applicare le impostazioni.

De instellingen kunnen alleen worden toegepast als het een lokaal account en actief account betreft, en de gebruiker onderdeel is van de groep 'sudo'. Als dat niet het geval is, dan moet de gebruiker inloggen als administrator.
To apply the settings, the user must be local and active, as well as in group sudo. Local and active users not in this group must authenticate themselves as admin in order to apply the settings.
To apply the settings, the user must be local and active, as well as in group sudo. Local and active users not in this group must authenticate themselves as admin in order to apply the settings.

Για την εφαρμογή των ρυθμίσεων, ο χρήστης θα πρέπει να είναι ενεργός και τοπικός, όπως επίσης και μέλος της ομάδας sudo. Οι υπόλοιποι χρήστες που δεν ανήκουν σε αυτήν την κατηγορία θα πρέπει να πιστοποιούνται ως διαχειριστές ώστε να εφαρμόσουν τις αλλαγές στις ρυθμίσεις.
